Lizard Lick Towing is an American reality television program that depicts the world of repossession.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lizard_Lick_Towing_(TV_Series)

Episode synopsis:
A dangerous tattooed man's car is targeted for repossession in the premiere of this nonscripted series following a repo business in Lizard Lick, N.C
